All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator in the system with associated credentials.
AdminCredentials
Class to hold the constant values for admin credentials.
AdminService
Interface representing the operations that an Admin can perform related to gyms and gym owners.
AdminServiceOperations
Implements the AdminService interface, providing operations for viewing users, gym owners, and gyms, as well as verifying gyms and gym owners.
BookingCancellationFailedException
Custom exception class for handling booking cancellation failures.
Bookings
Represents a booking in the system.
ColorConstants
Class to define ANSI color code constants for text formatting.
DatabaseConnector
 
DateAndTime
 
FlipFitAdminDAOImplementation
 
FlipFitAdminDAOInterface
 
FlipFitApplicationMainClient
 
FlipFitCustomerDAOImplementation
 
FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
 
FlipFitGymAdminMenu
 
FlipFitGymCustomerClientMenu
 
FlipFitGymOwnerClientMenu
 
FlipFitGymOwnerDAOImplementation
 
FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
 
FlipFitUpdatePasswordDAOImplementation
 
FlipFitUpdatePasswordDAOInterface
 
Gym
Represents a gym in the system with details such as name, address, location, and available slots.
GymOwner
Represents a gym owner with details such as personal information, credentials, and associated gyms.
GymOwnerService
Interface representing the operations that a Gym Owner can perform.
GymOwnerServiceOperations
Implementation of the GymOwnerService interface, providing business logic for gym owner operations.
InvalidAadhaarCardException
Custom exception class for handling invalid Aadhaar card scenarios.
InvalidGSTException
Custom exception class for handling invalid GST scenarios.
InvalidPanCardException
Custom exception class for handling invalid Pan Card scenarios.
InvalidPhoneNumberException
Custom exception class for handling invalid phone number scenarios.
ListNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a list is not found.
Notifications
Represents a notification with details such as category, message, and a unique identifier.
Payments
Represents a payment transaction with details such as card information and payment ID.
PaymentsService
Interface for payment-related operations.
PaymentsServiceOperations
Implementation of payment-related operations.
RegistrationFailedException
Custom exception class for handling registration failure scenarios.
SlotBookingFailedException
Custom exception class for handling slot booking failure scenarios.
SlotInsertionFailedException
Custom exception class for handling slot insertion failure scenarios.
Slots
Represents a time slot with details such as slot ID, start time, and seat count.
SlotsUnavailableException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where slots are unavailable.
SQLConstants
This class defines SQL queries used throughout the application for interacting with the database.
UpdationFailedException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where an update operation fails.
User
Represents a user with personal information including user ID, name, contact details, and address.
UserNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a user is not found.
UserService
Interface for user-related operations.
UserServiceOperations
Provides operations related to user services including user creation, updating user details, validating users, and managing bookings.
ValidateCard
Validator class for credit card details such as card number, expiry date, and CVV.
ValidateCredential
Validator class for validating user credentials such as email and password.
ValidateIdentity
Validator class for validating identity details such as phone number, address, Aadhaar number, PAN card, and GST number.
VerificationFailedException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where a user is not found.
WrongCredentialsException
Custom exception class for handling scenarios where incorrect credentials are provided.
